text: I am vile and very wicked and my expression is frightening
and my hands are tainted with blood.
And despite being uncouth, being violent and wearing a hook
I've always wanted to be a great pianist.
On the stage I become Mozart
and I make the keys take off.
I prefer to be feared because of my barbaric sound.
Thank you!
I also want to make my dream come true.
That's his dream. That's his dream.
I'm not as cruel as one might think.
And though I break
I want to make someday my dream come true.
I've got wheals, scars and, here, four varicose veins
and my face a bit stag-like.
I'm happy with six fingers, with my goitre and my nose,
and someday I'd like to be in love.
I dream of being with a beautiful lady
and sailing a sea of love.
And though I am a disgusting lad, I'm generous about love.
I also want to make my dream come true.
- That's my dream. - That's his dream.
- That's my dream. - That's his dream.
I know someday my sweetheart will arrive.
And though my face is horrifying, there's a boy dreaming inside.
I want to make someday my dream come true.
Thor someday would like to be a florist.
Gunther, to design interiors.
Ufl, to be a genius mime.
Attila, to bake butter cookies.
He, to knit; and he, to sew; and he over there to make a show;
and Vladi, to collect unicorns.
- And you, what's your story? - Pardon, are you talking to me?
What's your dream?
No, no, no. Sorry, folks. I don't sing.
My dreams are peaceful
and less delicate
and take place in sunny places.
I'll buy an island, nothing will disturb me,
I'll be surrounded by money and tanned.
- That's my dream. - That's her dream.
- That's my dream. - That's her dream.
I just want to see the shining lamps.
I've already escaped from my tower, and the time has arrived:
the time to see my dream come true.
- That's my dream. - That's her dream.

Our dreams don't differ, as you can see.
Come and join.
- Despite - Our
- looks, - our soul is no different,
we also have a dream.
- That's my dream. - That's my dream.

And someday I'll also reach my dream.
Yes!
